mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Dougherty, Thomas
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: West Side PO, Chicago Ill [West Side Post Office, Chicago, Illinois]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Dougherty, Thomas Patient Age: 23. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture of left hand accidental. Location Wounded: Cumberland. Date Wounded: 1864/08/01. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Returned to duty.
